<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="home default">2b5f9dc797432110a714bbe3a253af87</macroponent><name>stylized_text_1/text</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {

var startTimestamp=api.state.starting_date;
var endTimestamp=api.state.ending_date;


// Create a GlideDateTime object
var startgdt = new api.GlideDateTime();
return startgdt.getDisplayValue();
// startgdt.subtract(startgdt.getNumericValue()); // Resets the date to 0 so that we can add the milliseconds to the date
// startgdt.add(startTimestamp); // Adds the milliseconds to the date

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-01 17:01:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>90228527978b2110a714bbe3a253af8f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>stylized_text_1/text</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_90228527978b2110a714bbe3a253af8f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-01 17:11:28</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
